tool_description: Poeteer - is an AI-based API to generate blogs, articles, or topics from scratch! Just provide an idea of what you're going to generate the text and get the output in a few requests via Poeteer AI Writer!
name: Poeteer
title: Poeteer

api_list.name: Sections
api_list.description: Generates the article's high-level sections based on the provided title.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://poeteer.p.rapidapi.com/sections"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poeteer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Content
api_list.description: Generates the article/blog content based on the provided section name and article title.

api_list.name: Ideas
api_list.description: Generates a list of article/blog topics based on the idea provided.
